Northern Lights 2013

Northern Lights Conference is now in its third year, and will take place on Friday, 18 October in the historic King’s College, Aberdeen.

Get your ticket

18th October 2013

A full day catered event where you can learn from and with a great group of developers and innovators.

Get your ticket

Great talks and sessions

A content packed day, with terrific talks and break out discussion sessions for just £15.

Get your ticket

2 Keynotes

We have two terrific keynotes lined up that we'll announce over the coming weeks.

8 Talks

Our speaker list this year covers a wealth of topics, from established speakers and first timers.

Open Space

We are rebooting our discussions and bringing a flavour of the unconference to Northern Lights. It's going to be fun.

Venue

King's College , Old Aberdeen

Once again, Northern Lights returns to the historic King's college on the Old Aberdeen campus of Aberdeen University.

Speaker Call

We have a great line of speakers that we'll be announcing over the coming days, but we have a speaker slot open. If you'd like to speak at Northern Lights 2013 please get in touch at northern.lights.conf@gmail.com.

ANNOUNCING SOON

We'll be announcing a speaker every couple of days from here on in. Grab a ticket to get the updates straight to your mailbox, or follow us on twitter.
